articles.title: Roma's Mourinho concerned with happy players, fans not legacy - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: AS Roma coach Jose Mourinho said he was not fixated on becoming a legend at the club after leading his side to a second straight European final with a 1-0 aggregate win over Bayer Leverkusen after their Europa League semifinal, second leg on Thursday.
